amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the amount the Coast Guard charges in user fees for inspecting small passenger vessels and to increase by an equal amount the user fees for inspecting larger vessels.

action.text: Mr. Coble raised a point of order against the Tauzin amendment (A008). Mr. Coble stated that the provisions of the amendment requiring an increase in user fees applied to larger vessels constitued an increase in taxes and was, therefore, in violation of Rule XXI clause 5(b). The Chair sustained the point of order.
